snippet.title: Game & Watch: Lifeboat (1983 Nintendo)
snippet.description:
This game is HARD! And the fact that you have to empty the boats to avoid them getting full doesn't make it any better. Also, 28:56 happened because I took a screenshot and it freeze MAME briefly.
Emulation: MAME
Game Artwork: Hydef
(Also playable on Game & Watch Gallery 4)
You must control 2 lifeboats (1 in Game B) to catch passengers falling from a burning ship, similar to Parachute and Popeye (wide screen) in a way. If you miss a passenger or he falls into a boat with max passengers, he will fall in the water and a shark will chase him to the right side of the screen, where he will be eaten and you get a miss. If you reach 300 points, you will lose all misses, or double your points if no misses were earned.
